channel.title: Future Wubs [Name undecided] - RazerFireRiot (Future Bass, Test, WIP)
channel.description:
So I recently listened to @aUstin_Haga’s song Changes, and the bassdrop is what got my attention. I decided to try it on my own using Hour and Otter with the almighty automation, and this nice little idea came out.
I was thinking of some feedback of how it sounds as a future bass track before proceeding :wink:
Project: https://app.auxy.co/projects/H2iMYC5snn1ywMD5qrKLVg==
